scripts.android:staging: echo '安卓在本機安裝測試' && react-native run-android --mode=staging
scripts.android:release: echo '安卓在本機安裝正式' && react-native run-android --mode=release
scripts.android:push-staging: echo '安卓測試發佈' && appcenter codepush release-react -d Staging -t '*' -a weimi/CodePushCat-android
scripts.android:push-release: echo '安卓正式發佈' && appcenter codepush release-react -d Production -t '*' -a weimi/CodePushCat-android
scripts.android:display-keys: echo '安卓查詢熱更新 Key' && appcenter codepush deployment list -k -a weimi/CodePushCat-android
scripts.android:release-list: echo '安卓檢視發佈結果' && appcenter codepush deployment list -a weimi/CodePushCat-android
scripts.android:gradlew-staging: echo '安卓打包測試 apk' && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleStaging && cd ..
scripts.android:gradlew-release: echo '安卓打包正式 apk' && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.ios:staging: echo '蘋果在本機安裝測試' && deviceName='Grace' && echo "安裝至 $deviceName 裝置" && react-native run-ios --configuration Staging --device $deviceName
scripts.ios:release: echo '蘋果在本機安裝測試' && deviceName='Grace' && echo "安裝至 $deviceName 裝置" && react-native run-ios --configuration Release --device $deviceName
scripts.ios:push-staging: echo '蘋果測試發佈' && appcenter codepush release-react -d Staging -t '*' -a weimi/CodePushCat-ios
scripts.ios:push-release: echo '蘋果正式發佈' && appcenter codepush release-react -d Production -t '*' -a weimi/CodePushCat-ios
scripts.ios:display-keys: echo '蘋果查詢熱更新 Key' && appcenter codepush deployment list -k -a weimi/CodePushCat-ios
scripts.ios:release-list: echo '蘋果檢視發佈結果' && appcenter codepush deployment list -a weimi/CodePushCat-ios
